commands.level: Shows your level and current XP for the server.
commands.leaderboard: Shows the top 10 highest level users in the server.

commands.emote <action> [user]: Perform a custom emote to a user.
commands.stuff: Gru will stuff you all in the crust.
commands.random [...]: Let Kat choose from a list of inputs.
commands.hitormiss: I guess they never miss, huh?

commands.translate list: Sends a list of possible translatable languages
commands.translate [from:to (default: en:ja)]: Attempts to translate the last sent message.
commands.translatelast <user> [from:to (default:: Attempts to translate the user's last message in to [language=EN-US]
commands.translatemsg <msg ID> [from:to (default:: Attempts to translate the ID's message.

commands.clear [<100]: Remove up to 100 messages from the channel.

commands.config [module]: View/edit Kat settings for your server.
commands.purge <user> [reason]: Ban a user and delete all of their messages.
